channel.title: [PI] Flashing SideBarIcons [Client sided]
channel.description: Alright so I'm trying to add flashing sidebaricons for my client because atm when I wan't it to flash in all it does is pop up and donesnt flash. I know it's client sided because it works on my other client the client I'm using is the normal PI client, I've looked all over for this and couldnt find it So if anyone could help me that would be awesome! I'm poop at clients :(

item.title: [PI] Flashing SideBarIcons [Client sided]
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

You cud might add a loop for it so when it reaches a amount of time it junps to a diff sprite.
